entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
